mapper.sql: BOOK_NUM, BOOK_DATE, BOOK_TIME, MEMBER_NUM, EXP_NUM, STORE_NUM, EMP_NUM, GOODS_NUM
mapper.select: select BOOK_NUM, BOOK_DATE, BOOK_TIME, MEMBER_NUM, b.EXP_NUM, b.STORE_NUM, EMP_NUM, b.GOODS_NUM , STORE_ADDR, STORE_ADDR_DETAIL, STORE_POST, STORE_TEL, STORE_NAME , GOODS_NAME, GOODS_KIND, GOODS_CONTENTS, EXP_CONTENTS, EXP_NAME from book b join goods g on b.goods_num = g.goods_num join store s on b.store_num = s.store_num join experience e on b.exp_num = e.exp_num where member_num = #{memberNum} ORDER BY BOOK_DATE DESC, BOOK_TIME DESC

select BOOK_NUM, BOOK_DATE, BOOK_TIME, MEMBER_NUM, b.EXP_NUM, b.STORE_NUM, EMP_NUM, g.GOODS_NUM , STORE_ADDR, STORE_ADDR_DETAIL, STORE_POST, STORE_TEL, STORE_NAME , GOODS_NAME, GOODS_KIND, GOODS_CONTENTS, EXP_CONTENTS, EXP_NAME , GOODS_MAIN_IMAGE ,GOODS_MAIN_STORE_IMAGE from book b join goods g on b.goods_num = g.goods_num join store s on b.store_num = s.store_num join experience e on b.exp_num = e.exp_num where BOOK_NUM = #{bookNum} and MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}
